Needed it for gmod lol. Okay game, but I'm critical of the series. Bots is fun, but the community ruins online play. Maybe worst of all, the gameplay is so simple that there are two ways people play: camping, or flash bang spam. The idea of competitive cs should be a joke to most people, but it isn't for some reason

Haven't played too much, I can't aim worth shit, and I think I've lost all feeling in my left ball because of this game, but it sure is fun.
